message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,500.  It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to you. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm looking to spend closer to $13,000.  Would you be willing to go down to that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I can't go all the way down to $13,000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13,500?  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
